titleStmt.title: A Collection of choice books in divinity, history, philosophy, herauldry, horsemanship, husbandry with variety of books of voyages, travels, as also of romances, plays, novels &c. curiously bound, will be exposed to sale by way of auction at Bridges Coffee-House in Popes-Head-Alley over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill on Monday the 8th day ofFebruary 1685/6 / by Edward Millington ...

A Collection of choice books in divinity, history, philosophy, herauldry, horsemanship, husbandry with variety of books of voyages, travels, as also of romances, plays, novels &c. curiously bound, will be exposed to sale by way of auction at Bridges Coffee-House in Popes-Head-Alley over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill on Monday the 8th day ofFebruary 1685/6 / by Edward Millington ...
titleStmt.author: Chiswell, Richard.
Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Chiswell by Wing.
This item appears at reel 1438:12 as Wing C5119, and at reel 1710:20 as Wing C3908.
Wing number C3908 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Irregularities in paging: last page of copy at reel 1438:12 numbered 28, copy at reel 1710:20 numbered 16, with numerous other errors; page order and contents is same in both copies.
Reproduction of originals in the Bodleian Library and the British Library.
